ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust base knowledge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Dust is a source of energy in Remnant. The physical properties of Dust make it incredibly useful for a variety of purposes, particularly in weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Just weapons? They're an extension of ourselves! They're a part of us! Oh, they're so cool. - Ruby Rose

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Crystalline Dust is apparently safe enough to leave out on display openly, whereas powdered Dust should be handled with care.
